main event: Witnesses in Thomaston, Georgia, reported observing a ball-shaped object resembling the size of a basketball, which changed color from white to reddish while moving slowly in the southeast direction and appearing to rotate before disappearing at daylight.
interesting points: Two witnesses confirmed seeing the object, The object was noted to rise approximately 38 degrees above the horizon, The object appeared to rotate as it moved, It gradually disappeared with the coming of daylight after about 1 hour and 38 minutes of observation, The preliminary analysis suggested that the observers might have seen the planets Venus and Saturn.
sighted object: ball-shaped object, approximately the size of a basketball, changing from white to reddish
witness description: Both witnesses were 18 and 19 years old, listed as laborers, and appeared to be sound of mind.
